headline: Putin May Leave the Presidency in Russia in 2024, but That Doesn’t Mean Retiring
abstract: The Russian president may be leaving the presidency in 2024, but he is not about to retire. That could be dangerous for Russian stability — and himself.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW — Several years ago, for reasons that have never been explained, President Vladimir V. Putin vanished from the public eye for more than a week, sending the Russian capital into a tizzy over his fate.
